DOC.HEADLINE: NATION IN BRIEF ; FLORIDA ; TECHNICAL PROBLEMS BESET SHUTTLE CREW
DOC.TEXT: Equipment problems beset the crew of the space shuttle Discovery as the six astronauts tried to beam climate data back to Earth . Despite the problems , most of the data from experiments was being collected as planned , and the National Aeronautics and Space Administration said Discovery ' s mission of science and technology research was not in jeopardy . Mission specialist Carl Meade tried unsuccessfully to fix a high-speed data recorder that has not worked since the mission began Friday .
